relation: GIPF-01 German 800 Silver Marked etc Spoon With Wilhelm King of Prussia Royal Monogram Engraved & Dedicated to Major u Bats.Comier Jochum 1893-1903
GIPF-02 German 800 Silver Marked etc Spoon With Royal Monogram Engraved to Lt Hoffmann 1909

This is a German 800 Silver Marked etc Spoon With Wilhelm King of Prussia Royal Monogram Engraved & Dedicated to Major u Bats.Comier Jochum 1893-1903. This a 24 mm or an 8 inch long dinner spoon from the Kings dinner set. It was presented to this officer upon his retirement. It is in used but excellent condition. Here are additional views 1 2 3.

This is a German 800 Silver Marked etc Spoon With Royal Monogram Engraved to Lt Hoffmann 1909. This a 24 mm or an 8 inch long dinner spoon from this Kings dinner set. It was presented to this officer. It is in used but excellent condition. Here are additional views 1 2 3.

textAfterTable: Finland Lappi Swastika Emblem Silver Thumbnail (Click to Enlarge) Item Number Item Name Description, Size, Condition Price Status LAPPI-01 This is a difficult to locate pattern from Finland (Lappi) dated 1931. It is a 5-1/4 inch Cake Fork engraved with a Finnish swastika. This was developed independently from the German swastika and was used by the Finnish Air Force (and other units) as an identification symbol, which long predates the Continuation Wars and WWII combat. The Lappi 1931 is hand-engraved on the back, and the swastika and a stylized "L" is engraved on the front. It has a number of silver content marks. It show signs of wear and long service. The condition is used, with tarnish and signs of age. One of the little decorative rings is missing, as shown.   $499.99 Available German Imperial Flatware Thumbnail
